    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghoul Hide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=153)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 558 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Stitched together from pieces of ghoul skin, this suit of _+1 [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_ grants you a +1 item bonus to saving throws against disease and paralysis and makes you immune to the paralysis of ghouls. _Ghoul hide_ with a _resilient rune_ increases the resilient rune’s item bonus to saving throws against disease and paralysis by 1 (maximum +4).

 _Ghoul hide_ hisses with sibilant hatred at the touch of elves. When worn by a creature with the elf trait, the armor gains the noisy trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
